channel.title: English-Su.com - Adventures of Kevin and Aki
channel.description: Recent content on English-Su.com - Adventures of Kevin and Aki

item.title: Tahoe Rim Trail - Echo Summit to Kingsbury South - 4 days
item.description: Aug 11, 2017 Echo Summit -> Round Lake 9:45am - Depart echo summit trailhead near Hwy 50 12:11pm - Bryan Meadow Trail junction 12:34pm - Salyes Trail junction 14:44pm - Shower Lake - lunch break, chat with people with couple from Vegas. 15:30pm - Depart Shower Lake 16:23pm - Tahoe Rim Trail/Pacific Crest Trail junction 17:49pm - Arrive at Round Lake and setup camp

item.title: Queen Charlotte Track
item.description: Dec 1, 2015 Ship Cove->Camp Bay Campsite 27 km - Overcast/Rainy We took a ferry from the pier in Picton to the starting point of this hike at Ship Cove. During the ride we not only witnessed the green rolling mountains along Queen Charlotte Sound but also cute little penguins living on an isolated islands and groups of welcoming dolphins popping out of the water. The trail was muddy from the rain with continuous ups and downs and some bridge crossings but we were rewarded with stunningly beautiful views of the sound every once a while.
